mapper.select: SELECT orderSub.`order_sub_no` AS orderSubNo, mo.`pay_type` AS payType, orderSub.`sub_flag` AS subPayStatus, mo.`resource` AS resource, mo.`create_time` as createTime, mo.`pay_time` as payTime, mo.order_no as orderNo, logistics.`consignee_name`, logistics.`consignee_mobile`, mo.`name`, mo.`mobile`, mo.`resource` FROM m_order mo ,m_logistics logistics, m_order_sub orderSub WHERE orderSub.`order_no` = mo.`order_no` AND orderSub.`order_no` = logistics.`order_no` and orderSub.order_sub_no = #{orderSubNo}
